about_the_game:
HARVESTING


Immerse yourself in a world where every object is interactive. Use any item on any object to discover new resources and hidden treasures. The possibilities are endless!

  • Harvest resources from the environment in unexpected ways.
  • Experiment with various item-object interactions to uncover unique results.
  • Never run out of things to discover and collect in your adventure.

ALCHEMY


Combine any two items to create something entirely new. The art of alchemy lets you experiment and discover countless combinations, each with its unique effects and benefits.

  • Mix and match any items to see what you can create.
  • Every combination has the potential to surprise and delight.
  • Unleash your creativity and find the most powerful concoctions.

CRAFTING


Manipulate items using a variety of unique workstations. Each workstation offers different crafting possibilities, allowing you to make even more choices about the new items you create.

  • Craft the perfect items to aid you on your journey.
  • Discover new recipes and unlock advanced crafting techniques as you level up your skills.

CUSTOM WORKSTATIONS


Take your crafting to the next level by creating your own custom workstations. Design and build unique stations that enhance your crafting abilities and offer new possibilities.

  • Research and build custom workstations to suit your specific crafting needs.
  • Place your new workstation in the world and use it like any other workstation.
  • Design the perfect production chain for whatever industry you want!

LIVING NPCs


Engage with living, breathing NPCs who have their own wants, needs, and goals. Every NPC lives a dynamic life, interacting with you and the world in meaningful ways.

  • NPCs pursue their own goals and needs, whether or not you intervene.
  • Influence NPCs to shape the world according to your desires.
  • Experience a world where NPCs interact with each other and you in unexpected ways.
  • Enjoy open-ended conversations where you can say anything, leading to organic and unpredictable interactions.

NON-DETERMINISTIC QUESTS & EVENTS


Experience infinite replayability with non-deterministic quests and events. The world evolves based on your actions, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

  • Quests and events change based on your actions and the state of the world, offering a new experience every time you play.
  • Your decisions shape the world and its inhabitants.
